Text:
You stole this torrent from a person on TPB. 

Please get a life
Oh really, would you be so kind to link me the torrent then?
Would you be so kind to link me the torrent I 'stole' then?
Sorry for the double comment, my comment didn't appear at first.

The crack is not working. After applying the patch the game loads but all 3d stuff gets black. All I can see is the name of the towns and villages and the menus.

I even reinstalled the patch and it worked in trial mode normally but upon reapplying the crack I got the same error.

I've downloaded it twice so the file sure is bad.
After doing some research it seems the SKIDROW crack causes the graphic glitches you're talking about. The general solution given is to start unchecking your graphics options until it works.
There is no other crack available at the moment, so your only options are to lower your graphics settings, or wait with updating until a proper crack comes out.
Works perfectly :) Thanks for the upload!
sorry for double post, didn't show up, just wanted to tell u guys it works and don't listen to some other noobs
Okay, this is fantastic... Now is there a way to find a 1.143 version of Warband?
When i go to multiplayer, it says i need a serial key. How do i get the serial key??

Go to a gamestore and buy the game. LOL.

About graphixs problems, when I turned the "HDR mode" on the game went all crazy. Or well, it was mostly just black etc. When I turned it off it works just fine, no problems.

Btw, anyone noticed that your troops dont really gain experience (atleast not the same way they did in warband)?
whats with the multiplayer, it doesnt work for me
... where is the crack? it isn't in the skidrow folder >.>

@thebe7 yea i was mad confused with the experience thing... it is suppose to have a system but it doesnt? dont understand (and there is an experience cheat which does absolutely nothing to my knowledge)
There's a Script Bug,idk if its from this update or older but you cant win the rebbelion when you got all the things done(script error)
Just a heads up, the graphic glitches happen when you have HDR or Depth Effects enabled. Just make sure those two are disabled and you can have anything else on.
